name: WebAppVFSDelete
friendlyName: Delete Item from Azure Web App
description: Delete Item from Azure Web App through Kudu VFS Rest API
author: Geert van der Cruijsen

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment.

inputs.name: WebAppName
inputs.label: App Service name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing Azure App Service.

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: File URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: the file or directory path after the wwwroot/ of your Azure Web app. paths ending with / are marked as directories

inputs.name: deleteRecursive
inputs.label: Recursive Delete
inputs.helpMarkDown: delete all subfolders and files in selected directory

inputs.name: continueIfFileNotExist
inputs.label: Skip non existing path
inputs.helpMarkDown: If file that is being deleted does not exist on path continue on 404 error?

inputs.name: allowUnsafe
inputs.label: Allow Self Signed Certificates
inputs.helpMarkDown: enable this to ignore self signed certification errors

inputs.name: alternativeKuduUrl
inputs.label: Alternative Kudu URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: value of SCM endpoint if it is not website.scm.azurewebsites.net (fill in only last part starting with scm.)

instanceNameFormat: Delete file from Azure Web App
